parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.54</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game version

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Compares types of all elements of input array to types of all elements of template array. Similar to [[isEqualTypeArray]] however this command is designed for fast validation of functions params, so there are differences:
* Input can be anything but will be expected to be an [[Array]], otherwise [[false]] is returned
* Input array can be longer but not shorter than template array, will return [[false]] if shorter
* [[nil]] could be used in template type array as a wild card to allow any type match
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> input '''isEqualTypeParams''' template </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> input: [[Anything]] - could be value of any type, but only type [[Array]] will be validated </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> template: [[Array]] - array of expected types </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[1,2,[[player]],"10"] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[objNull]],""]; //true
123 [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[objNull]],""]; //false
[] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[objNull]],""]; //false
[1,2,[[player]]] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[objNull]],""]; //false
[1,2,[[player]],"10",[[true]]] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[nil]],""]; //true
[1,2,[[getPos]] [[player]],"10",[[true]]] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[nil]],""]; //true</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[isEqualTypeAll]], [[isEqualTypeAny]], [[isEqualType]], [[isEqualTypeArray]], [[param]], [[params]], [[isEqualTo]], [[typeName]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
